title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions: Transform yourself into a masterpiece with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! This professional makeup kit is perfect for kids and adults who want to create stunning looks for Halloween, parties, or artistic performances. With 20 vibrant colors including gold, silver, and more, this palette is non-toxic, skin-friendly, and easy to blend. The oil-based formula is quick-drying, smudge-proof, and durable, ensuring your creations last all night long. From festivals to carnivals to stage performances, this palette is versatile and perfect for any occasion. Get creative with crown, costume, bruise, blood, or cosplay looks. Easy to wash off with olive oil or professional makeup remover, the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is a must-have for any makeup enthusiast!
